nodes.text: Serenity was the leader of the Force Priestesses.

During the Clone Wars, Jedi Master Yoda arrived on the planet in the center of the galaxy, where the Force Priestesses resided, being lead there by the spirit of Qui-Gon Jinn. Serenity and the other priestesses put Yoda through a number of tests, deeming him able to retain his identity after death.
